page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content:
The area is served by{three primary} {schools}in the villages of Bosham, Fishbourne, and Funtington. Only the school at{Funtington}is in the study area. The schools cover the{five to {eleven age range}and each is a recently constructed building with surrounding playing fields.
At the age of eleven children proceed to the{secondary comprehensive}schools at{Emsworth}or{Chichester.} These schools have sixth forms although some teenagers opt for Chichester College of Technology.
A number of{commercial playgroups}or {nurseries}have been established throughout the area - one based in Funtington County Primary School.
